question.string: How much was spent on public works and utilities by the Town of Cary in 2011?
question.query: select sum(xsd:decimal(?amount)) from <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/town_of_cary_expenditures> { ?obs qb:dataSet ls:town_of_cary_expenditures. ?obs lso:town_of_cary_expenditures-amount ?amount. ?obs lso:town_of_cary_expenditures-Class <https://openspending.org/town_of_cary_expenditures/Class/6>. ?obs lso:refYear ?year. filter(year(?year)=2011). } 23831652

question.string: Which programs were done under the class of public works and utilities in the expenditure of the Town of Cary?
question.query: select ?program from <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/town_of_cary_expenditures> { ?obs qb:dataSet ls:town_of_cary_expenditures. ?obs lso:town_of_cary_expenditures-Program ?program. ?obs lso:town_of_cary_expenditures-Class <https://openspending.org/town_of_cary_expenditures/Class/6>. } https://openspending.org/town_of_cary_expenditures/Program/51 https://openspending.org/town_of_cary_expenditures/Program/50 https://openspending.org/town_of_cary_expenditures/Program/44 https://openspending.org/town_of_cary_expenditures/Program/43 https://openspending.org/town_of_cary_expenditures/Program/53 https://openspending.org/town_of_cary_expenditures/Program/42 https://openspending.org/town_of_cary_expenditures/Program/41 https://openspending.org/town_of_cary_expenditures/Program/52 https://openspending.org/town_of_cary_expenditures/Program/48 https://openspending.org/town_of_cary_expenditures/Program/47 https://openspending.org/town_of_cary_expenditures/Program/46 https://openspending.org/town_of_cary_expenditures/Program/45 https://openspending.org/town_of_cary_expenditures/Program/49

question.string: How much did the Town of Cary earn in 2009?
question.query: select sum(xsd:decimal(?amount)) from <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/town_of_cary_revenues> { ?obs qb:dataSet ls:town_of_cary_revenues. ?obs lso:refYear ?year. filter(year(?year)=2009). ?obs lso:town_of_cary_revenues-amount ?amount. } 116661346

question.string: Which program earned the most for the Town of Cary?
question.query: select ?program from <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/town_of_cary_revenues> { ?obs qb:dataSet ls:town_of_cary_revenues. ?obs lso:town_of_cary_revenues-Program ?program. ?obs lso:town_of_cary_revenues-amount ?amount. } order by desc(sum(xsd:decimal(?amount))) limit 1 https://openspending.org/town_of_cary_revenues/Program/1

question.string: Which department of whiteacre spent the most in 2010?
question.query: select ?dep from <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/city-of-whiteacre-spending> { ?obs qb:dataSet ls:city-of-whiteacre-spending. ?obs lso:city-of-whiteacre-spending-to ?dep. ?obs lso:city-of-whiteacre-spending-amount ?amount. } order by desc(sum(xsd:decimal(?amount))) limit 1 https://openspending.org/city-of-whiteacre-spending/to/954008

question.string: How much does the general district court of Whiteacre receive for court appointed attorney fees a year?
question.query: select ?year sum(xsd:decimal(?amount)) from <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/city-of-whiteacre-spending> { ?obs qb:dataSet ls:city-of-whiteacre-spending. ?obs lso:city-of-whiteacre-spending-object <https://openspending.org/city-of-whiteacre-spending/object/3150.0>. ?obs lso:city-of-whiteacre-spending-to <https://openspending.org/city-of-whiteacre-spending/to/210708>. ?obs lso:city-of-whiteacre-spending-amount ?amount. ?obs lso:refYear ?year. } group by ?year order by desc(sum(xsd:decimal(?amount))) limit 1 2010-01-01+01:00 78478.5

question.string: Which agencies in the Maldives have proposed expenditure amounts of more than 1 billion Maldivian rufiyaa in 2015?
question.query: select ?agency from <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/maldives_proposed_expenditure_2015> { ?obs qb:dataSet ls:maldives_proposed_expenditure_2015. ?obs lso:maldives_proposed_expenditure_2015-Agency ?agency. ?obs lso:maldives_proposed_expenditure_2015-amount ?amount. filter(xsd:decimal(?amount)>1000000000). } https://openspending.org/maldives_proposed_expenditure_2015/Agency/minister-of-housing-and-infrastructure https://openspending.org/maldives_proposed_expenditure_2015/Agency/ministry-of-finance-and-treasury https://openspending.org/maldives_proposed_expenditure_2015/Agency/ministry-of-health https://openspending.org/maldives_proposed_expenditure_2015/Agency/expenses-for-foreign-aid-for-projects https://openspending.org/maldives_proposed_expenditure_2015/Agency/ministry-of-home-affairs https://openspending.org/maldives_proposed_expenditure_2015/Agency/ministry-of-education https://openspending.org/maldives_proposed_expenditure_2015/Agency/expenses-from-foreign-aid-loans

question.string: What is the total aid to the Anti Corruption Commission in the Maldives in 2015?
question.query: select sum(xsd:decimal(?amount)) from <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/maldives_proposed_expenditure_2015> { ?obs qb:dataSet ls:maldives_proposed_expenditure_2015. ?obs lso:maldives_proposed_expenditure_2015-Agency <https://openspending.org/maldives_proposed_expenditure_2015/Agency/anti-corruption-commission>. ?obs lso:maldives_proposed_expenditure_2015-amount ?amount. } 32499312

question.string: Which Ugandan district had the highest budget in 2014?
question.query: select ?district from <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ministry_of_health> { ?obs qb:dataSet ls:ministry_of_health. ?obs lso:ministry_of_health-District ?district. ?obs lso:ministry_of_health-amount ?amount. ?obs lso:refYear ?year. filter(year(?year)=2014). } order by desc(sum(xsd:decimal(?amount))) limit 1 Northern

question.string: Top 10 IW Council Spending expense types?

10000

question.string: Over which programmes more than 1000000 pound but less than 10000000 pound in grants were given by the Big Lottery Fund?
question.query: select ?programme from <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/big-lottery-fund-grants> { ?obs qb:dataSet ls:big-lottery-fund-grants. ?obs lso:big-lottery-fund-grants-programme-name ?programme. ?obs lso:big-lottery-fund-grants-amount ?amount. } group by ?programme having (sum(xsd:decimal(?amount))>1000000&&sum(xsd:decimal(?amount))<10000000) Community Asset Transfer Round 2 2014 Communities Village SOS Active Impact of Alcohol Millennium Now Awards for All Northern Ireland Our Place Next Steps supporting Social investment in England Energy Efficient Venues (Large) BIG Innovation Investing in Communities 2 Stage 1 The Silver Dreams Fund Investing in Ideas 2

question.string: What was the Albania budget for public order and safety in 2007?
question.query:
select sum(xsd:decimal(?amount)) as ?sum from <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/al_planned_budget_2007to2013> { ?obs qb:dataSet ls:al_planned_budget_2007to2013. ?obs lso:al_planned_budget_2007to2013-cofog1 <https://openspending.org/al_planned_budget_2007to2013/cofog1/public-order-and-safety>. ?obs lso:al_planned_budget_2007to2013-amount ?amount. ?obs lso:refYear ?year. filter(year(?year)=2007). }
139476632344

question.string: What was the combined Albania budget for health from 2007 to 2010?
question.query:
select sum(xsd:decimal(?amount)) as ?sum from <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/al_planned_budget_2007to2013> { ?obs qb:dataSet ls:al_planned_budget_2007to2013. ?obs lso:al_planned_budget_2007to2013-cofog1 <https://openspending.org/al_planned_budget_2007to2013/cofog1/health>. ?obs lso:al_planned_budget_2007to2013-amount ?amount. ?obs lso:refYear ?year. filter((year(?year)>=2007)&&year(?year)<=2010) }
127536838000

question.string: What is the external debt amount of Kwara?
question.query:
select sum(xsd:decimal(?amount)) as ?sum from <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/external-debts> { ?obs qb:dataSet ls:external-debts. ?obs lso:external-debts-to <https://openspending.org/external-debts/to/kwara>. ?obs lso:external-debts-amount ?amount. }
163020905.38

question.string: How much external debt did rivers have in 2010?
question.query:
select sum(xsd:decimal(?amount)) as ?sum from <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/external-debts> { ?obs qb:dataSet ls:external-debts. ?obs lso:external-debts-to <https://openspending.org/external-debts/to/rivers>. ?obs lso:external-debts-amount ?amount. ?obs lso:refYear ?year. filter(year(?year)=2010) }
35508206.25

question.string: How many admins were responsible for mandatory payments in the Armenian approved budget of 2010?
question.query:
select count(distinct(?admin)) from <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ddc94682cc95482a8deefc60596686fc> { ?obs qb:dataSet ls:ddc94682cc95482a8deefc60596686fc. ?obs lso:ddc94682cc95482a8deefc60596686fc-economic <https://openspending.org/ddc94682cc95482a8deefc60596686fc/economic/4823>. ?obs lso:ddc94682cc95482a8deefc60596686fc-from ?admin. }
36

question.string: How much total running expenses under budgetary classification did the Armenian approved budget of 2010 have?
question.query: select sum(xsd:decimal(?amount)) as ?sum from <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ddc94682cc95482a8deefc60596686fc> { ?obs qb:dataSet ls:ddc94682cc95482a8deefc60596686fc. ?obs lso:ddc94682cc95482a8deefc60596686fc-economiclevel1 "Running expenses". ?obs lso:ddc94682cc95482a8deefc60596686fc-type "personnel". ?obs lso:ddc94682cc95482a8deefc60596686fc-amount ?amount. } 68583483000
